comments.author: Alejandro Knoxville

comments.text:
In moments of tension euphoria and adrenaline, you stop felling the pain 
for a short period of time. That's a basic explanation, cause I don't 
remember what is exactly happening in the body. It happens to soliders, or 
in accidents, you start feeling the real pain moments later. The cocaine 
only helps to increase even more this effect. It's not like he is not 
getting damage, he just doesn't feel the pain. He would have bleed out 
anyway. Sorry for my english
comments.author: Alejandro Knoxville

comments.author: Mathew Clemence

comments.text:
+Mathew Clemence There are actually quite a few cases where people who had 
no drugs in their system have been shot in the chest through the heart with 
a 12 Gauge shotgun and ran for a few blocks before dying. People have also 
dropped dead instantly because they thought they had been shot. 
Adrenaline/The Human Body is a crazy thing.
